import React, { useState } from "react"; const BooksComponent = () => { const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const [isPurchasing, setIsPurchasing] = useState(false); const books = [ { id: 1, title: "JavaScript Mastery", price: 499, cover: "ðŸ“˜" }, { id: 2, title: "React Basics", price: 399, cover: "ðŸ“—" }, { id: 3, title: "Node.js Guide", price: 599, cover: "ðŸ“•" }, ]; const addToCart = (book) => { if (!cart.find((item) => item.id === book.id)) { setCart([...cart, book]); } }; const removeFromCart = (id) => { setCart(cart.filter((item) => item.id !== id)); }; const purchase = () => { setIsPurchasing(true); setTimeout(() => { alert("Purchase successful!"); setCart([]); setIsPurchasing(false); }, 1000); }; const totalAmount = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.price, 0); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("role"); window.location.reload(); }; return (

); }; export default BooksComponent;
